metadata.description: Files event fields for S1QL 2.0 queries

fields.description: Container ID. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Container image. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Container Image ID
Container Image Sha256
Container labels. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Container name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes controller labels. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes controller name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes controller type. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes cluster name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes namespace. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes namespace labels. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes node name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes pod labels. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Kubernetes pod name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Is binary backing source process an executable
The description of the file taken from version information. For example, if the image is "cmd.exe", this would be "Windows Command Processor"
The "internal name" field from the process's image resource.
MD5 signature
The "Original filename" field taken from the process's image properties.
The "Product Name" field taken from the process's image properties.
The "Product version" field taken from the process's image properties.
SHA256 signature
The source process's image file type
Signature sign identity
Signature not verified reason
Real/Relinked PID (after relinking)
Verifies the process validity and integrity. Unsigned processes may pose a security risk.
Thread id
Verification status of process signature
Cluster name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task Ecs Version. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task service ARN. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task service name. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task tags. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task ARN. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task Availability Zone:. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task definition ARN. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task definition family. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Task definition revision. Will be presented only for events triggered on K8s Agents.
Reputation, Static AI
Date and Time of File Creation. Format: epoch time (milliseconds since 1.1.1970), Timezone: UTC
Description of file
File Extension
Unique ID of file
Internal name of file
Indicates whether the target file is a directory.
Is file executable
Is file signed
Location of file
MD5 Signature of File
Date and time file was modified. Format: epoch time (milliseconds since 1.1.1970), Timezone: UTC
The target file name. For example, if the file path is a\b\c.txt then this field will be c.txt
Old file MD5 before Modify
Old path before 'Rename'
Old file SHA1 before Modify
Old file SHA256 before Modify
Type of action that spawned the file
The process name that spawned the file
The process UID that spawned the file
Source path for copied files, or URL for downloaded files
If file was copied, describes the source file's location. If file was downloaded, describes which program created it
The "Original filename" field taken from the file's properties.
The name of the process that owns this file.
The Security Descriptor (SID) of the user that the process that owns this file is using.
The full path of the target file including the file name
The "Product Name" field from the file's properties.
The "Product version" field from the file's properties.
The entity that signed the target file.
SHA1 Signature of File
SHA256 Signature of File
Indicates whether the file's digital signature is valid.
Indicates why the file signature was deemed invalid
File Size in bytes
Type of file
